Activity: Wake up, review financial news and analyst reports.
Arrive at the office. Address urgent emails and check progress on key tasks.
Meet with @Qres-1, @Qres-2, @Qres-3 to discuss the impact of recent market events on the fund's investment strategy. Refine backtesting models to account for changing market conditions.
Oversee the final selection of the trading platform and data provider, considering factors such as cost, performance, and reliability.
Approve the risk management framework after incorporating all relevant feedback and refinements.

Email @COO-1, @Legal-1, @larch-1: Topic: Trading Platform and Data Provider Selection. Announce the final selection of the trading platform and data provider to relevant stakeholders. Initiate the onboarding process and contract negotiations.
Lunch Break. Discuss potential investment opportunities with colleagues.

Meet with @onbd-1 (Client Onboarding Specialist) and @ir-1 (Head of Investor Relations) to discuss the fund's marketing materials and investor communication strategy. Ensure all materials accurately reflect the fund's investment strategy and risk profile.
Review the marketing and communication plan prepared by @mkt-1 (Marketing & Communications Specialist). Provide feedback on messaging, target audience, and distribution channels.
Discuss the implementation plan for the risk management framework with @Qres-2 and @comp-1. Ensure the framework is effectively integrated into the fund's operations.
Review the latest performance reports from competing arbitrage funds. Identify areas where the fund can improve its strategy and execution.
Leave the office. Relax and unwind.
